title: DAOs to Fund Projects
description: 小規模なプロジェクトの資金調達は、投資家に見過ごされがちです。しかし、もし出資者が最初の「ローン」に対してより多くの見返りを得られるとしたらどうでしょうか？

f6_assessments.q0: Honestly, I think the team forgot about this proposal cause it does not contain any information that would make it eligible for funding. In terms of if this proposal addresses the challenge - maybe. The proposal title would let me assume they would want to start several DAOs? But in the text it seems to circle around using or creating (?) but at least utilizing a token to give out to investors. Or a treasury? If so, for whom? However, the fact that I have to interpret what the proposal would want to achieve disqualifies it.
f6_assessments.q1: There is neither a roadmap, nor milestones or a financial plan provided, the team is not introduced, it is highly unlikely that this proposal would be implemented at all.
f6_assessments.q2: No, there is no relevant information provided that would make it possible to audit the proposed idea - there are also no measurements of success and the problem statement and the offered solution are unclear, it is not even clear if this team is even planning to implement their project on the Cardano network or not? No idea what startups they are referring to. As I said, I´m assuming the team or the proposer simply forgot about this one....

f6_assessments.q0:
Draft proposal. There is no clear relationship between the problem presented and this challenge.
There is not enough information to assess impact. I would recommend checking the Catalyst documentation for reference to create a new proposal and search for an appropriate challenge to submit the proposal.
f6_assessments.q1: Draft proposal. There is not enough information to assess deasibility. I would recommend checking the Catalyst documentation for reference to create a new proposal and search for an appropriate challenge to submit the proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: Draft proposal. There is not enough information to assess auditability. I would recommend checking the Catalyst documentation for reference to create a new proposal and search for an appropriate challenge to submit the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is one of five proposals of the proposer that does not fulfill any formal requirements while asking for large sums of funds. Please do not vote for this.
f6_assessments.q1: No plan, budget rationale or proof of qualification is provided.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal does not contain any information to make it auditable.

solution: 新興企業に出資する小口投資家は、利益の一定割合や製品の割引などの特典があるユーティリティー・トークンを受け取ります。
experience: アクセラレーターであるStation Fで活動する小さな起業家チームとして、資金調達の選択肢に不満を感じています。開発、ビジネス、経済
